overview: Bobbi McCoy (Jennifer West Savich) isn't your average gal. She's a waitress by day and a bounty hunter by night. When ex-cop / bounty hunter Mitch Dobbs (Butch Engle) hires her as backup on a mission to capture the ruthless mobster Rico LaFlores (Jeff Cuda) the bullets will fly and the blood will flow.
tagline: Keep Your Eye On The Gun
title: A Face Full Of Bullets
